page.title: 19Trade.
page.content: Trading in the village of Newport has under gone a dramatic change since the population of the village has nearly doubled as two new housing estates have been built recently. The first most significant change was when the local grocery shop was closed to be replaced by a self-service supermarket.Newcomers to the village are pleased with the variety of shopping facilities.There are two butchers, a hair dressers, a bank, a clothing shop and a very popular fish and chip shop. For car repairs and petrol sales there is a newly renovated garage. There are also three public houses. In addition to the permanent trading shops, there are various tradesmen who bring shops on wheels, such as the fish trader and a mobile vegetable trader.
